topicTitle: You got Trolled! For you though my troll was really a Troll!

posts.postText: Depending on how many people vote, I will deside. Added, I still have to ask Gash.
I VOTE YES. WHAT AM I VOTING FOUR

>> I VOTE YES. WHAT AM I VOTING FOUR 
I plan on having a contest like I did for portal 2. And that other game I can't remember the game of.

This time I will just let the winner pick the game they are getting.

OH YA! I forgot, I need ideas for the contest... That is all...

 Note, if gash says no. Then just consider this a trollololawlolol!

IDEA! Payday: the heist, Skyrim, Skyrim, Skyrim, Skyrim, and Skyrim.
